description:
With the only tunnel to the village sealed off, Akira and the others decide to cut through the forest and cross the mountain. Along the way, they run into a man who is constructing a treehouse. Akira’s eyes sparkle as he offers his assistance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La maison dans les arbres de la mort
ツリーハウス オブ ザ デッド
